snippet: A defendant’s requests to use a restroom that can accommodate her wheelchair are thwarted.
abstract: Jim Dwyer About New York column holds that lack of handicap restroom on floor of Manhattan criminal courthouse where prisoners are held is travesty and dehumanizes people; highlights credit card scammer Banetta Grant, who uses wheelchair and was unable to use restroom while waiting to appear in court.
